questions.title: How do i delete my site/zite entirely?
questions.body: Hello, if i clone site like ZeroTalk for testing purpose and then decide i want to completely remove it and i will not want other people to seed it and even seeders be able to access it, how can i entirely remove it possibly including freeing its zeronet address? Thank You

questions.title: Meaning of the ZeroHello function "Check files" and File update failed?
questions.body: Hello, please what is the meaning of the ZeroHello function "Check files" which results in error: "2 File update failed"?

questions.title: How can i seed my zeronet data folder simultaneously on other Linux headless machine?
questions.body: Hello dear zeronet users, i wanted to ask for a help/a guide on how do i seed my existing zeronet data directory on other, headless linux (centos/ubuntu) machine. I want to be able to continue using my zeroid on my current PC, i just want to add one seed to everything. Hope it is possible and will make no collision. I am connected to more than 500 sites and need to reduce my current Windows 10 PC connections because it is causing issues. I just do not know quick and proper way to initiate seeding when i copy over data folder and if that is actualy possible and will not cause collision when i use that data dir also on my PC.

questions.title: How to restore deleted content.json
questions.body:
Hello, what are methods to recover accidentaly deleted content.json file of the own zeronet site / zite?
Here user managed to do so: http://127.0.0.1:43110/peeper.bit/?Post/1White24UrrwQrD86o6Vrc1apgZ1x1o51/13oRBYqNeUr6Tvgt4KkAT9FT4XRiKFBjnE/1517176792
I think what he did was to click Sign & Publish and then cancelled the operation when it prompted for the private key. I may be wrong.

questions.title: How do i backup my ZeroMe profile please?
questions.body:
Can anyone please suggest how do i backup my ZeroMe profile before i use "ZeroMe Unfuck" (search at ZeroHello)?
I already found the ZeroMe address to be 1MeFqFfFFGQfa1J3gJyYYUvb5Lksczq7nH and found same named folder in ZeroNet's data directory. But i do not know what file to backup.

questions.title: What is the difference between cloneable and not cloneable site?
questions.body:
i was thinking i can still copy not-cloneable site directory contents into my site directory. But will be there anything missing when comparing to the site that is cloneable? What that will be?

btw: i think cloneable status is changed in main content.json file of the site

comments.body: the linux seedbox will have different IP, GEO location, is a VPS in pro datacenter

Thank you, by the way, here is mentioned on how to setup seed server/seedbox : http://127.0.0.1:43110/16Go5kc2U9Ff4jeaY8kYiDEgpMYdgyboPY/?Topic:2_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS/How+to+Install+and+run+Zeronet+on+a+Raspberry+Pi
So i do not have to backup anything inside ZeroMe zite data folder? Note that i am talking about ZeroMe profile, not ZeroNet profile (which is backed up using users.json).
